item.title: Polls open in US elections - here are five things to watch
item.description: Though President Donald Trump is not on the ballot, his agenda looms large over the races in New York City, New Jersey, and Virginia.

item.title: Curfew lifted in Tanzania's main city after election unrest
item.description: Families continue to search for or bury relatives, a day after President Samia Suluhu Hassan was sworn in.

item.title: At least 26 dead as typhoon wreaks havoc in the Philippines
item.description: Large areas are flooded, including entire towns on the island of Cebu.

item.title: Former US Vice-President Dick Cheney dies aged 84
item.description: Cheney became one of the most powerful vice-presidents in US history under George W Bush.

item.title: Seven climbers dead after Nepal avalanche
item.description: Rescuers located two bodies and are searching for the remaining five, believed to have been buried by snow.
